xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Wiki Manager Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Various translations that are used in the wiki template and, implicitly, in the created wiki.
## MENU core.menu.type.wiki=Wiki core.menu.watchlist.add.wiki=Watch Wiki core.menu.watchlist.remove.wiki=Unwatch Wiki core.menu.admin.wiki=Administer wiki
# WIKI INFORMATION PANEL platform.wiki.panel.title=Wiki information
# MESSAGES platform.wiki.currentwiki.welcome=Welcome to the {0}{1}{2} wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserIsOwner=You are the owner of this wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserIsAdmin=You are an administrator of this wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinNeedToLogin=To join this wiki you need to be logged in. platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserNotMember=You are not a member of this wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentuserCanJoin=If you like, you can {0}join this wiki{1}. platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserIsMember=You are a member of this wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserCanLeave=If you like, you can {0}leave this wiki{1}. platform.wiki.currentwiki.gadgetTopActiveUsersAllMembers=To see the full list of wiki members, you can use the {0}User Directory{1} page. platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationPendingForCurrentWiki=You have been invited to join this wiki platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinRequestPendingForCurrentWiki=You have requested to join this wiki platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinRequestAcceptedNotification=Your request to join the wiki ''{0}'' has been accepted. platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinRequestRejectedNotification=Your request to join the wiki ''{0}'' has been rejected. platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateHandledSaveComment=Handled candidate {0} ({1}) platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateHandledComment=Comment: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateAcceptedSuccess=Request accepted successfully. platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateRejectedSuccess=Request rejected successfully. platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteUserAlreadyMember={0} is already a member of the wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteRequestAlreadyExists={0} already has a pending request. Please respond to that request instead. platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteUserAlreadyInvited={0} already has a pending invitation. platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteSaveComment=User ''{0}'' has been invited to join the wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteNotification=You have been invited to join the wiki ''{0}''. platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteSuccess={0} invited successfully. platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelSaveComment=Cancelled invitation {0} ({1}) platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelNotification=Your invitation has been cancelled and is no longer valid. platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelSuccess=Invitation cancelled successfully. platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelFailure=Error, you cannot cancel this invitation. platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateReviewFailure=Error, you cannot cancel this invitation.
# LABELS platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.wikiprettyname.label=Pretty Name platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.description.label=Description platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.owner.label=Owner platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.membershipType.label=Membership Type platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.secure.label=Secure (SSL) platform.wiki.currentwiki.member.add=Add or invite users to wiki platform.wiki.currentwiki.gadget.wikiInformation.label=Wiki Information platform.wiki.currentwiki.gadget.topActiveUsers.label=Top Active Contributors platform.wiki.currentwiki.panel.information.name.label=Name platform.wiki.currentwiki.panel.information.description.label=Description platform.wiki.currentwiki.panel.information.members.label=Members platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitation.view.label=View Invitation platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinrequest.cancel.label=Cancel Request platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinreques.request.label=Request Join platform.wiki.currentwiki.join.label=Join platform.wiki.currentwiki.leave.label=Leave Wiki platform.wiki.currentwiki.invite.username.label=User name platform.wiki.currentwiki.invite.message.label=Message platform.wiki.currentwiki.invite.button.label=Invite platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.label=Candidates platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.status.label=Status: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.type.label=Type: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.reviewer.label=Admin: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.reviewermessage.label=Admin's Message: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.reviewerprivatecomment.label=Private Comment: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.accept.label=Accept platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.reject.label=Reject platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.invitation.cancel.label=Cancel Invitation platform.wiki.currentwiki.wikiusers.title=Wiki Users platform.wiki.currentwiki.managewikis.title=Wiki WikiManager.WikiCandidateMemberClass_status_pending=Pending WikiManager.WikiCandidateMemberClass_status_accepted=Accepted WikiManager.WikiCandidateMemberClass_status_rejected=Rejected WikiManager.WikiCandidateMemberClass_type_request=Request WikiManager.WikiCandidateMemberClass_type_invitation=Invitation
# HINTS platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.wikiprettyname.hint=The display name of the wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.description.hint=A brief description of the wiki and its purpose. platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.owner.hint=A user who will have all the rights on the wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.membershipType.hint=The way users can join this wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.secure.hint=If enabled, all this wiki's generated externals URLs will start with {0}https:~/~/{1}. platform.wiki.currentwiki.invite.username.hint=The name of the user to add to the wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.invite.message.hint=The message to send to the user. platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.hint=Users who have requested or been invited to join the wiki.
# ADMIN admin.xwiki.manageworkspace.description=Manage settings such as wiki name, description, owner and membership type. admin.xwiki.workspaceusers.description=Manage wiki members: add, remove, invite, accept or reject wiki members. admin.xwiki.usersconfiguration.title=Configuration admin.xwiki.members.title=Current Members
# DRAWER ITEM platform.wiki.drawer.homeWiki=Home
